title: Das senseBox Buch Kapitel 1
name: Mario
text: Die Blöcke findest du in der Kategorie "Schleifen". Die einfachste Schleife, die du Verwenden kannst, ist der Block "Wiederhole 10 mal". Bei diesem Block kannst du die Blöcke, die eine bestimmte Zahl wiederholt werden soll einfach in den offenen Block abschnitt ziehen.
xml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <block type="controls_repeat_ext" id="!|`dyF$`~*!l~D[TUc4N" x="38" y="32">
    <value name="TIMES">
      <block type="math_number" id="ktgQ[7pD~M{sq;r^kLuz">
        <field name="NUM">10</field>
      </block>
    </value>
  </block>
</xml>

title: Das senseBox Buch Kapitel 2
name: Mario
xml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <block type="arduino_functions" id="5KebY,-ltvxB7K^El}1(" x="30" y="34">
    <statement name="LOOP_FUNC">
      <block type="sensebox_led" id="Y(DUYI_.t1V!_9Qf7lgl">
        <field name="PIN">1</field>
        <field name="STAT">HIGH</field>
        <next>
          <block type="time_delay" id="C2.adlos#1/Ns)1@K!Or">
            <value name="DELAY_TIME_MILI">
              <block type="math_number" id=")uPzh6_L+SQaIr+v8B,">
                <field name="NUM">1000</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="sensebox_led" id="w215h=etDdQ(Aao86qG2">
                <field name="PIN">1</field>
                <field name="STAT">LOW</field>
                <next>
                  <block type="time_delay" id="1pPNxT#ag6fFP|=fy(,%">
                    <value name="DELAY_TIME_MILI">
                      <block type="math_number" id="%xCj(nr,]@f{ALe^{vH}">
                        <field name="NUM">1000</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

title: Das senseBox Buch Kapitel 3
name: Mario
xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="arduino_functions" id="5KebY,-ltvxB7K^El}1(" x="30" y="34">
    <statement name="SETUP_FUNC">
      <block type="sensebox_display_beginDisplay" id=")Z4]CI*ibRqWkqLr^pjb"></block>
    </statement>
    <statement name="LOOP_FUNC">
      <block type="sensebox_display_show" id="r)I#b]xjcH,b@8g*,Pf^">
        <statement name="SHOW">
          <block type="sensebox_display_printDisplay" id="o{6DR6H4f;Qj%n=@XgaW">
            <field name="COLOR">WHITE,BLACK</field>
            <value name="SIZE">
              <block type="math_number" id="u}2t2rIa6Wx2)42.Ij]}">
                <field name="NUM">1</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="X">
              <block type="math_number" id="6n/}z0xXtJLhHm0E9kF/">
                <field name="NUM">0</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="Y">
              <block type="math_number" id="Y-NwVU`0,j73ON)ODL^Y">
                <field name="NUM">0</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="printDisplay">
              <block type="text_join" id="t*`nvkah#B@JrGRge`u[">
                <mutation items="2"></mutation>
                <value name="ADD0">
                  <block type="text" id="*n^fD@DZEq^eLPc|CvJ[">
                    <field name="TEXT">Helligkeit:</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="ADD1">
                  <block type="sensebox_sensor_uv_light" id="tT8cG:UHho:SUKZQLVG{">
                    <field name="NAME">Illuminance</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

title: Das senseBox Buch Kapitel 4
name: Mario

              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="X">
              <block type="math_number" id="6n/}z0xXtJLhHm0E9kF/">

              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="Y">
              <block type="math_number" id="Y-NwVU`0,j73ON)ODL^Y">
                <field name="NUM">0</field>
              </block>

        </statement>

    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
